email.subject: Important: Submit Your Voter Form to Your Election Office from iVoteIsrael
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

Thanks for choosing the iVoteIsrael site to register to vote and request your ballots for $!electionYear. iVoteIsrael works with Overseas Vote Overseas Vote, a non-profit, non-partisan organization, to find ways to improve the voting process for overseas voters.

We're glad you've got your Write-in Ballot now and can cast your vote in this important election! Remember to sign your cover page form and send it with your Write-in Ballot to your election official who needs your original signature.

If your ballot arrives from your election office after you have sent the Write-in Ballot in, please complete it and send it in to replace the Write-in Ballot.

Here's to you for casting your ballot!
- From the team at iVoteIsrael

Contact us at iVoteIsrael@overseasvotefoundation.org anytime with questions or comments.
